description:
This video is sponsored by Ground News. Compare news coverage. Spot media bias. Avoid algorithms. Try Ground News today and get 40% off your subscription by going to https://ground.news/captainmidnight
After Spider-Man: No Way Home, there's so many directions you could take Spider-Man 4. In this video, I talk about the rumors surrounding Justin Lin, Tom Holland, Tobey Maguire and Sam Raimi.
GodzillaMendoza Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=13vLGy1wUGY&t=2s&ab_channel=GodzillaMendoza

Special thanks to Andrew Elliott (Stalli111: https://www.youtube.com/user/Stalli111  ) for editing this video.
title: Spider-Man 4 Has To Be Great
